Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by stating that there was a "gun attack" at a shopping mall in Amsterdam, when in fact it was a counter-terrorism exercise carried out by the German police.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based solely on a video posted on Twitter without any additional evidence or verification.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video depicts a real gun attack without conducting proper investigation or fact-checking.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video actually shows a counter-terrorism exercise and not a real gun attack.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that the video is part of a planned drill by the German police and not an actual incident at a shopping mall in Amsterdam.
